description:
From beloved classics like Kesariya Balam and Chaudhary to fresh originals,
this is a concert that bridges the old and the new. A celebrated Coke Studio
artist, Bollywood playback singer, and global ambassador of Indian folk, Mame
Khan has performed in over 60 countries and was the first folk artist to walk
the Cannes red carpet. Most recently, he launched the world's first folk
orchestra at NMACC with over 50 artists on one stage.
name: Windmills Music Night - Mame Khan

performer.description: Step into the vibrant world of Rajasthani folk with Mame Khan’s Rock'N'Roots—a high-energy celebration of tradition, rhythm, and global sound. Known as the signature voice of Rajasthan, Mame Khan and his electrifying folk fusion band bring the spirit of the Thar Desert alive on stage, blending iconic folk melodies with contemporary flair.
performer.name: Mame Khan's Rock N Roots Project

description:
Their performance is a seamless confluence of East and West--where tradition
meets innovation, and melody meets rhythm. Experience a musical journey that
is both meditative and electrifying, rooted in deep cultural expression and
improvisational brilliance. Whether you're a fan of classical purity or genre-
defying fusion, Sangamam promises an evening of sonic enchantment and
emotional resonance.
name: Windmills Music Night - Sangamam

performer.description: Sangamam is a one-of-a-kind fusion concert that brings together the soul of three powerful traditions through the violin, oud, and tabla. Featuring acclaimed artists Jyotsna Srikanth (violin), Smadj (oud), and Gurumurthy Vaidya (tabla), this trio blends the intricacies of Indian classical, Middle Eastern, and contemporary world music.
performer.name: Sangamam

description:
In 2023, he performed at the Mahindra Blues Festival in India alongside
legends like Buddy Guy and Taj Mahal. His 2024 tour includes top festivals
like the Chicago Blues Festival, Telluride Blues & Brews, and Millennium Park
Summer Series. Featured in Gibson Guitars' 2024 campaign, Ivan was also
nominated Best Blues Band in Chicago by The Chicago Reader in 2023 and 2024..
name: Windmills Music Night - Ivan Singh

performer.description: Ivan Singh is a rising Latino blues guitarist and singer from Argentina, now making waves in Chicago with his signature LatinBlues style. Blending Spanglish lyrics, vibrant rhythms, and his homemade 4-string guitar (Lata de Batata), Ivan brings an energetic, cross-cultural sound to the stage with his dynamic six-piece band and horn section.
performer.name: Ivan Singh
